title: Modifications
summary: This is about the stat upgrade modules for ships. for turrets, click here.
full_text:
Modifications
This is about the stat upgrade modules for ships. for turrets, click here.
Modules are items that can be applied to a ship to change its statistics and abilities.
There are two types of modules: 
Rigs are always-active upgrades that affect your ship's statistics at all times. 
Subsystems are abilities that can be activated and only affect statistics for a limited time while they are active before a cooldown.
